enb_long_title: Tenth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: In the conclusions (FCCC/SBSTA/2004/L.18), SBSTA takes note of the continuing work of ICAO and IMO, and the ongoing cooperation among the secretariats of the UNFCCC, ICAO, IMO and IPCC on the issue of emissions from international aviation and maritime transport.
SBSTA also requests the UNFCCC Secretariat to prepare information on methodological issues by SBSTA 22.
